page.title: 09Blue Bell Garage
page.content: The Blue Bell Garage was built twenty six years ago and has since been changed to a large covered area with better designed pumps which serve the{petrol}in litres and give the total cost to the motorist. Most people use four star petrol which is the most expensive at Â£1.94 per gallon. The garage takes great care with safety precautions and as yet there have not been any accidents with the petrol. Apart from serving petrol they service cars, provide a hire car service, sell old and new vehicles and have a{car wash}which costs Â£1 per car. As for car sales, the best selling cars are{Vauxhalls}for which the garage has a franchise. They sell mainly medium priced family cars costing between Â£5000 and Â£6000.
